growthexperiments-help-panel-postedit-tr: Ne fo zunoɔ ne fo teɛretɔ sɛgere ennaa kaŋa la ŋmɛ yaaroo!
Duori{{GENDER:|fo}} gɔɔloŋ tazie ane sɛgere eŋ paalaa kaŋ iruŋ enyaabo
Bareka ne{{GENDER:|fo}} kyeɛraa. E sɛgere eŋ paalaa iruŋ kaŋ nyɛ: $1
growthexperiments-help-panel-postedit-no:
Teɛretɔ sɛgere enne maŋ soŋ la sɛgere empaaba 
ka ba zanne te gboŋ ne {{BEZIEYUORI}} e sonne, kyɛ mɛ sɛgere emmo gɔɔloŋ anaŋ naŋ e nimizeɛ .
